Class ScreenshotServiceWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simpligility.maven.plugins.android.ScreenshotServiceWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceCallback

    public class ScreenshotServiceWrapper
extends Object
implements DeviceCallback
    ScreenshotServiceWrapper wraps the feature to capture a screenshot during an instrumentation test run.
